verses.text: \w At|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* first time \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Zabulon, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Nephtali \w was|strong="H0776"\w* lightly touched: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* last \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sea \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Jordan \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Galilee \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Gentiles \w was|strong="H0776"\w* heavily loaded.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* walked \w in|strong="H8055"\w* darkness, \w have|strong="H0834"\w* seen \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* light: \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* region \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* death, light \w is|strong="H0834"\w* risen.

Thou hast multiplied \w the|strong="H0853"\w* nation, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* hast \w not|strong="H3588"\w* increased \w the|strong="H0853"\w* joy. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* rejoice \w before|strong="H3117"\w* thee, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* harvest, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* conquerors rejoice \w after|strong="H3117"\w* taking \w a|strong="H3588"\w* prey, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* divide \w the|strong="H0853"\w* spoils.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* yoke \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* burden, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* shoulder, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* oppressor thou best overcome, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Median.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* every violent taking \w of|strong="H1121"\w* spoils, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* tumult, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* garment mingled \w with|strong="H5921"\w* blood, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* burnt, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* CHILD \w IS|strong="H0369"\w* BORN \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* son \w is|strong="H0369"\w* given \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w government|strong="H4951"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* shoulder: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* name \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* called, Wonderful, Counsellor, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Mighty, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Father \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* world \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H7068"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Prince \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7971"\w* empire \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* multiplied, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* there \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* no end \w of|strong="H1697"\w* peace: \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* sit \w upon|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* throne \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* kingdom; \w to|strong="H3478"\w* establish \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* strengthen \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* justice, \w from|strong="H3478"\w* henceforth \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* ever: \w the|strong="H1697"\w* zeal \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* hosts \w will|strong="H3478"\w* perform \w this|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H3427"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* into \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0669"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* hath lighted \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5307"\w* all \w the|strong="H1129"\w* people \w of|strong="H0730"\w* Ephraim shall know, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H0730"\w* Samaria \w that|strong="H5307"\w* say \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* pride \w and|strong="H5307"\w* haughtiness \w of|strong="H0730"\w* \w their|strong="H5307"\w* heart:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* bricks \w are|strong="H3068"\w* fallen \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* we \w will|strong="H3068"\w* build \w with|strong="H3068"\w* square stones: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sycamores, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* we \w will|strong="H3068"\w* change \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* cedars.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H7725"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* enemies \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Rasin \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* enemies \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H5750"\w* crowd:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* Syrians \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* east, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Philistines \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* west: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* devour \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* open mouth, \w For|strong="H6635"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* indignation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3068"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w still|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* people \w are|strong="H3117"\w* not returned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3772"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* hath struck \w them|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not sought \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* destroy \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* Israel \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* bendeth \w down|strong="H3384"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* holdeth back, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* day.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* aged \w and|strong="H2088"\w* honourable, \w he|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* head: \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* prophet \w that|strong="H2088"\w* teacheth \w lies|strong="H1961"\w*, \w he|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* tail.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w call|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* blessed, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* err: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* called blessed, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* thrown \w down|strong="H5186"\w* headlong.

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord shell \w have|strong="H3588"\w* no joy \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* young men: neither \w shall|strong="H8068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3341"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fatherless, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* widows: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* every \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0784"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hypocrite \w and|strong="H0398"\w* wicked, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* every mouth hath spoken folly. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H0398"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* indignation \w is|strong="H0784"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* turned \w away|strong="H0398"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* bend \w is|strong="H0784"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H0784"\w* still.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* wickedness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* kindled \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* devour \w the|strong="H0413"\w* brier \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* thorn: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* kindle \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* thicket \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* wrapped \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* smoke ascending \w on|strong="H0413"\w* high.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* hosts \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w is|strong="H0376"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fire|strong="H0398"\w*: \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* spare \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* hungry: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* filled: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* shell eat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flesh \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* own \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*: Manasses \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* Manasses, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Juda.
After all these things his indignation is not turned away, but his hand is stretched out still.
